mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderBase(orderNo, cusNo, orderDate, requirement, orderStatus, prdShopNo) SELECT orderBase_seq.nextval, #{cusNo}, #{orderDate}, #{requirement}, #{orderStatus}, #{prdShopNo} FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM orderBase WHERE cusNo=#{cusNo} AND orderDate=#{orderDate})
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo FROM orderBase WHERE cusNo=#{cusNo} AND orderDate=#{orderDate}
